options.label: 3-Low - Change with no or minimal (less than 25 users  or 1-10 customers) impact
2-Med - Change with moderate (25 - 250 users or 10 - 25 customers) impact
1-High - Change with significant (10% or > 250 users or > 25 customers) impact
Application or Service will be unavailable for use
Application or Service could experience slow performance
Application or Service would be available, but some features could be unavailable
Application or Service would remain functioning as designed
No - Testing has not been performed or testing not possible
Yes - Testing has been performed or proven process

fieldDefinitions.label: Are Impacted Persons Aware/prepared For Test/checkout?

options.label: Checkout include User Validation / Checkout  during change
Checkout includes Technical team validation (manual or automated)
Both User and Technical team validation planned
Deployed with Issues and No Business Impact
